ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/fatedier/frp
ns0:entry.ns0:content: A fast reverse proxy to help you expose a local server behind a NAT or firewall to the internet.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/gin-gonic/gin
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Gin is a HTTP web framework written in Go (Golang). It features a Martini-like API with much better performance -- up to 40 times faster. If you need smashing performance, get yourself some Gin.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/gitleaks/gitleaks

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/hashicorp/nomad
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Nomad is an easy-to-use, flexible, and performant workload orchestrator that can deploy a mix of microservice, batch, containerized, and non-containerized applications. Nomad is easy to operate and scale and has native Consul and Vault integrations.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Terraform enables you to safely and predictably create, change, and improve infrastructure. It is a source-available tool that codifies APIs into declarative configuration files that can be shared amongst team members, treated as code, edited, reviewed, and versioned.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Agent for collecting, processing, aggregating, and writing metrics, logs, and other arbitrary data.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/juicedata/juicefs
ns0:entry.ns0:content: JuiceFS is a distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and S3.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/k3s-io/k3s
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Lightweight Kubernetes

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/kubernetes/kube-state-metrics

ns0:entry.ns0:content: End-to-end stack for WebRTC. SFU media server and SDKs.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/weibaohui/k8m
ns0:entry.ns0:content: 一款轻量级、跨平台的 Mini Kubernetes AI Dashboard，支持大模型+智能体+MCP(支持设置操作权限)，集成多集群管理、智能分析、实时异常检测等功能，支持多架构并可单文件部署，助力高效集群管理与运维优化。
